correspondence.message: I am a Master's student in Data Engineering and Analytics. I have completed 90 credits and will be in my 8th standard semester next (Winter 24) but counted as my 6th due to COVID. If I cannot complete my master's thesis in that semester, will I have a 7th semester to finish it? I recall a maximum of 7 years for completion, and would I be allowed to extend to a 7th semester if needed?"
You can refer to our tips for information. If you have 2 COVID prolongations, you may finish your studies in your 9th semester (7 + 2) if you have 90 ECTS after your 7th semester.
